aboutpara: Hello! I'm Pavan Chhalani, a passionate AI & Computer Science student at the University of Edinburgh. I've interned as a software engineer, leading projects that streamline operations and enhance user experiences. I also enjoy sharing knowledge as a tutor, boosting student performance significantly. When I'm not coding , you can find me involved in chess games, learning poker or playing squash. Let's connect and explore how we can innovate together!
